name: Dark Angel
description:
Dark Angel

Dark Angel is an RPG game developed for PC with focus on battles and exploration the game tells the story of young guardians responsible for keeping peace on earth and ensuring the safety of a mystic crystal sent by being from another dimension, this crystal has the ability to give unimaginable powers to people capable of manipulate it.



Explore a beautiful medieval world full of traps and challenges, protect the mystical crystal from the hands of Palacio Valhalla who have been trying to steal the crystal for centuries and now they come more prepared than ever.



Defeat monsters and enemies using weapons and spells. During the game another 4 guardians will help you during your journey, don't forget to answer the advisor's questions correctly to win free gifts.



Like a good RPG, defeat as many enemies as possible and increase your experience level to prepare for the decisive battles.

Game features

- RPG action game.

- Increases your strength by gaining experience.

- Test your knowledge through of questions.

- Buy weapons, spells and armor.

- Save the game progress.

- Choose your preferred language English or Portuguese.

- Guaranteed hours of fun.
